scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm publish && git push && echo "wait for publishing..." && sleep 10 && bun update --global fast-ngrok && fast-ngrok --version && ssh root@104.248.84.190 '/root/.bun/bin/bun update --global fast-ngrok && export PATH="/root/.bun/bin:$PATH" && /root/.bun/bin/fast-ngrok update-service'
